channel.title: Bird's Eye Reproducibility
channel.description: Recent content on Bird's Eye Reproducibility

item.title: Schedule
item.description: Part 1 - Introduction (15 min) Intro: Me and Computational Reproducibiltiy (slides) - background - reproducbility define (15 min) Break out. In (15 min) Come back to talk about. Discussion: What are the hardest parts about working to make your work fully reproducible? Part 2 - Birds Eye View (slides) (30 minute) Principles of Workflow Design - Define workflow vs pipeline - Introduction to schematic - Introduction to research products - Introduction to each phase Discussion (15 min): Whole group.
